document_data.name: Merry's Mounts and More
document_data.mainbody: '''Merry's Mounts and More''' was a stable in [[Halfhap]]. It was operated by the [[elf]] [[Merialeth Loriamanthor]].
document_data.Services: The stables housed and sold horses, ponies and livestock, as well as riding gear and other supplies. On rare occasions, Merialeth could obtain a young [[hippogriff]] and would only sell it to a trustworthy potential master.
